On the top, the words that are searched all the time or at least half of the time. Each of them has its own thread in the fabric.

less

On the bottom, all in the same thread, are the words that are searched less than half of the time, tipically as a response to a crisis event.

Health

Words related to mental health come to the top; they are very intensively and frequenly looked up.
